text: The 17th Annual Petit Le Mans presented by Mazda was the 2014 edition of the Petit Le Mans automotive endurance race, held on September 30-October 3, 2014, at the Road Atlanta circuit in Braselton, Georgia, United States.Road Atlanta Petit Le Mans. http://www.roadatlanta.com/petit-le-mans-road-atlanta This marked the first Petit Le Mans run under the newly merged Tudor United Sportscar Championship. As part of the new series, Daytona Prototype endurance-style cars were eligible to participate for the first time. The race was won by Wayne Taylor Racing in 10 hours (400 laps). A record number of 13 cautions was set for the event.IMSA Official Race Report. http://www.imsa.com/sites/default/files/race_result_files/TUDOR%20Championship%20Road%20Atlanta%20Race%20Official.pdf ==Race== ===Race result=== Class winners in bold.
